Text:
This was a fantastic good mix by Gary Moore's Live Concert's! An unparalleled work you put into this!I thank you most humble for that you share  this fantastic memories of this outstanding blues / rock player with us
--------------------------
Used to be so easy to give my heart away
But I found out the hard way
There's a price you have to pay
Though the days come and go
There is one thing I know
I've still got the blues for you.
Rest in Peace Mr Gary Moore

R.I.P Gary, legends will never die
A real Man never dies, neither does His Music...P.I.P Gary! And thanks a million hunter!

Thanks  for this great compilation hunter,

a real tribute to one of the best guitar player ever:)

Yes! Thank you, great upload.  

Check out BBM (Bruce Bake & Moore 94) on YouTube, some magic moments !!
was looking for I Love You More Than You'll Ever Know " a live version
